message.content:
Siyakuncedela ngokubhala le blog ukugcwalisa amalungu amane amakhiwo:

1. Zenza ukuba nesicelo: Qala ngokubhala ngokuba unxibelelwano wakho ngokuzenzela ucingo okanye email ukuba ungqwalise amalungu amakhiwo. Ungase uze ulungele ukuba abantu abangama-10-15 abanokukhathazeka ngencwadi yakho. 

2. Qhagamshelana nabo: Beka isahluko esicacileyo sokunxibelelanisa ngokwenene nezinye izinto ezithile ezininzi ezinganxibelelana nokuzenzela ucingo. Zihlandelele ukuba ubenomthetho nesimiso sokunxibelelana. 

3. Ngokwesibini, bika ngokunciphisa: Zenzela umrhumo wokubhala wokunciphisa. Qhagamshelana ngezinto ezifanelekileyo ezisebenzisa ukuzenzela ucingo okanye email. Beka imibandela emithathu yokunciphisa, ukuba kube ngumhla, umsebenzi wokuphumla nokusetyenziswa ngaphandle kwezimbandela. 

4. Beka ukufakwa: Faka amalungu amakhiwo abakhathazekileyo, amagama nesihloko esisodwa sokunciphisa kwaye kufakwe kwimibandela yokunciphisa. 

5. Funda futhi qhayisa: Funda futhi qhayisa le blog ngokuzingela nodaba ezinikezwe kwaye kufakwe kwimibandela yokunciphisa. 

6. Qhagamshelana ngemali: Ukuba kufuneka, qhagamshelana nezinto ezifanelekileyo ezisetshenziswa ukuthenga amacandelo ekuthelekisaneni nazo ezimakethe. 

7. Xhumana nabantu
